creator: patthoyts@users.sourceforge.net
text:
The attached patch applys some minor fixes to get the code to compile with
MSVC++ 6.0 under Windows (Win2K specifically). Also it provides a win/
subdirectory with a Tcl-style Makefile.vc and a Visual Studio project file.

With this in place, building the Rivet code becomes:
  nmake -f Makefile.vc TCLDIR=c:\opt\tcl INSTALLDIR=c:\opt\tcl OPTS=symbols
  nmake -f Makefile.vc TCLDIR=c:\opt\tcl INSTALLDIR=c:\opt\tcl OPTS=symbols install

Done.
We even have a Windows installer now :)
creator: patthoyts@users.sourceforge.net
